newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Handelsbanken says opinion on Stadshypotek same.
newsitem.headline: Handelsbanken says opinion on Stadshypotek same.

text.p: Swedish commercial bank Handelsbanken said on Monday due diligence regarding Swedish mortgage bank Stadshypotek did not change its opinion about the mortgage lender.

Handelsbanken said in a statement that its takeover offer for mortgage bank Stadshypotek was conditional that certain information, due diligence, about the mortgage bank's operations would not change its opinion.
"This condition is now fulfilled," Handelsbanken said.
Handelsbanken launched a 22.9 billion crown takeover bid for Stadshypotek on Thursday. The bid was accepted by the state, the largest single shareholder in Stadshypotek with a 34 percent stake.
